title: Eamon's Engagement
description: She’s the beautiful, curvy girl of my dreams… And I won’t stop until I replace her fiancé.Audie’s cheating fiancé may be rich and handsome, but she’s done with his playboy ways. Which gives me the perfect opening to make her mine.Running into the stunning, voluptuous Audie at a coffee shop is easy enough, and when she needs me to become her fake boyfriend, I’m more than happy to play along… With an ulterior motive in mind.When I see something I like, I don’t stop until I own it. Unfortunately, Audie’s the daughter of Murray Hale - the rival mob family I’m going up against.Her father may think he can force gorgeous Audie to settle for her fiancé, but I have something else in mind. I’m going to charm her before she finds out about my mafia kingdom.Now I just have to make sure Audie doesn’t find out I’m a killer…Eamon’s Engagement is a full-length standalone dark mafia romance, part of the Mafia Heirs Gallaghers series. All books can be enjoyed as standalones.
author: Raven  Scott
